titleStmt.title: The tickler tickled, or, The observator upon the late tryals of Sir George Wakeman, &c. observed by Margery Mason, spinster.
titleStmt.author: Mason, Margery.

notesStmt.note: A review of Some observations upon the late tryals of Sir George Wakeman ... by Tom Ticklefoot [i.e. Francis Smith].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
